ovdesc.p: Payment Features that are specific to a product. Payment Details that are allowed, optional and mandatory are defined based on product in PAYMENT.ORDER.PRODUCT.

desc.p: ID of Payment order Product record
Validation Rules: Ten digit text. No other validations
Description about the product. For enrichment in PAYMENT.ORDER
Validation Rules: Length of 35 characters. Language supportable. Mandatory
Group of the payment product being defined. This could be categorized such as "Account to Account Transfers", "Domestic" or "International".
This is an EB.LOOKUP field where user can customize their own groups and link the product to any of the group's defined.
Validation Rules:
Mandatory
Rank of the product
Validation Rules:10 digit free text. Only numbers allowed. No other validations
Indicates whether Payment is done through the Beneficiary
Validation Rules: Option allowed YES_NO. No validations
Indicates whether the beneficiary details defaulted from the beneficiary record can be overridden or not
Validation Rules: Option allowed YES_NO. Default value NO. Allowed only when PAY.THROUGH.BENEFICIARY is set to YES. Released as NOINPUT in Phase I
List of allowed Payment Currencies. Optional. Null indicates all the currencies
Validation Rules: Valid currency in T24 Currency table. Value should not be duplicated in the multi value set and null multi value not allowed.
List of allowed Ordering Currencies. Optional. Null indicates all the currencies
Validation Rules: Valid currency in T24 Currency table. Value should not be duplicated in the multi value set and null multi value not allowed.
Indicates whether the REQUESTED.AMOUNT and REQUESTED.CURRENCY can be defined in PAYMENT.ORDER or not. If set to NO, then the REQUESTED.AMOUNT is not allowed in PAYMENT.ORDER
Validation Rules:YES_NO. No validations. Released as NOINPUT in Phase I

Future processing date allowed or not. If defined as YES, then a payment order can be defined with future processing date (PAYMENT.EXECUTION.DATE field in PAYMENT.ORDER). If defined as NO, then error will be thrown if PROCESSING.DATE is not Today
Validation Rules:YES_NO.
Mandatory field

Required credit value date allowed or not. If defined as YES, then required credit value date can be allowed in the payment order. If defined as NO, then error will be thrown if the field has value. If YES is given and in payment order if required credit value date is defined as backdated, then override will be raised. Override will also be raised if the REQUIRED.CREDIT.VALUE.DATE falls before the date calculated based on the float
Validation Rules:YES_NO. Mandatory
Charge bearer options allowed for the product. While doing PAYMENT.ORDER transaction, to determine whether the Charger bearer specified is allowed for the product or not
Validation Rules: Values allowed are BEN, OUR or SHA. Value should not be duplicated in the multi value set and null multi value not allowed.
Default Charger bearer for the product. If charge bearer is not defined in PAYMENT.ORDER, then the default charger bearer to be populated
Validation Rules: Values allowed are BEN, OUR or SHA. Must be allowed charge as mentioned in the ALLOWED.CHARGE.OPTIONS field
To define whether credit and debit can be in different currencies. If defined as YES, then the debit and credit currency (DEBIT.CCY and PAYMENT.CCY fields)in PAYMENT.ORDER can be different
Validation Rules:YES_NO. Null will be considered as NO. No validations

To define whether the fields PAY.REQ.FX.CUST.RATE, PAY.REQ.FX.SPREAD, ORDERING.PAYMENT.FX.CUST.RATE, ORDERING.PAYMENT.FX.SPREAD,PAY.REQ.TREASURY.RATE,ORDERING.PAYMENT.TREASURY.RATE in PAYMENT.ORDER can be defined or not. If set to NO, then the FX rates cannot be defined in PAYMENT.ORDER while doing cross currency transactions
Validation Rules: YES_NO. YES is allowed only when ALLOW.FX is set. Mandatory when ALLOW.FX is set
% of tolerance above which exchange rate difference override will be raised. If not specified, then the rate tolerance override will not be raised
Validation Rules: Allowed only when ALLOW.FX and ALLOW.FX.RATE are set to YES. Value zero should also be allowed. Maximum of two decimal values is allowed
No. of days taken for execution of the order that involves FX
Validation Rules: nC, nW - n denotes no. of days 0-9, C - calendar days, W- working days. Allowed only when ALLOW.FX is set
No. of days taken for execution of the order that doesn't involve FX
Validation Rules: nC, nW - n denotes no. of days 0-9, C - calendar days, W- working days

To define HOLIDAY of which country to be considered. Destination currency - Country code from Credit currency record,holiday record of that country Destination country - Beneficiary country Default - Local country
Validation Rules:DESTINATION CURRENCY_DESTINATION COUNTRY
List of allowed Beneficiary's country codes
Validation Rules: Valid Country code. Allowed only when PAY.THROUGH.BENEFICIARY is set to YES. Duplicate values not allowed in the multi value set and null multi value not allowed.
The field BENEFICIARY.IBAN in a PAYMENT.ORDER transaction done using pay through beneficairy option, can hold value based on configuration of this field.
Allowed options are either 'Mandatory', 'Allowed' or 'Not Allowed'. If it is 'Not Allowed' and if IBAN is given in payment order or 'Mandatory' and IBAN not given, then error will be thrown.

Validation Rules: Optional field. Inputtable field only if IN is installed. Allowed or Mandatory for payment through beneficiary. If left undefined then configuration defined in country rules for given beneficiriay country will be taken for consideration.
The field BENEFICIARY.BIC in a PAYMENT.ORDER transaction done using pay through beneficairy option, can hold value based on configuration of this field.
Allowed options are either 'Mandatory', 'Allowed' or 'Not Allowed'. If it is 'Not allowed' and if BIC is defined or 'Mandatory' and BIC not given, then error will be thrown.

Validation Rules: Optional field. Allowed or Mandatory for payment through beneficiary. If left undefined then configuration defined in country rules for given beneficiriay country will be taken for consideration.
Bank code directory against which the bank codes in PAYMENT.ORDER is to be validated
Validation Rules:No validations. Released as NOINPUT in Phase I
The field BEN.BANK.CODE in a PAYMENT.ORDER transaction done using pay through beneficairy option, can hold value based on configuration of this field.
Allowed options are either 'Mandatory', 'Allowed' or 'Not Allowed'. If it is 'Not Allowed' and if bank code is given or 'Mandatory' and bank code not given, then error will be thrown.

Validation Rules:Optional field. Allowed or Mandatory for payment through beneficiary. If left undefined then configuration defined in country rules for given beneficiriay country will be taken for consideration.
Indicates the clearing channel to be used
Validation Rules:
Indicates the format of the clearing code based on which the clearing code entered in payment order will be validated
Validation Rules:Alphanumeric
Reserved for future use.
System field, no input.
API to perform validations specific to a product
Validation Rules:Valid EB.API record
Defines whether the API should get executed immediately or when moved from warehouse for future dated orders
Validation Rules:Null_YES. Yes is allowed only when ALLOW.FUTURE.DATE is set to YES and in PAYMENT.ORDER.PARAMETER, WAREHOUSE.REQD is set to Y
To check if the Payment Order transaction is the duplicate of any other transaction
Validation Rules:Valid record in EB.DUPLICATE.TYPE. Call FT.NULLS.CHK and DUP to avoid null and duplicate values in the multi-value field
Narrative for the product
Validation Rules:String of 65 characters
Additional information about the product
Validation Rules:TEXT field. Free text of 120 characters
List of country for which below assocaited country based rules can be defined independently, to be used for validating payment order.
If payment country defined then agreed rules defined here will only be taken for consideration against payment order validation.
If payment order country is not defined here, then generic rules defined for prodcut will be considered for validation POA.
If any of the generic fields of payment order is left undefined then rules for validatin POA will be arrived from COUNTRY RULES application
Validation Rules:Optional field. Valid country code from COUNTRY application.
The field BENEFICIARY.IBAN in a PAYMENT.ORDER transaction done using pay through beneficairy option, can hold value based on configuration of this field.
Allowed options are either 'Mandatory', 'Allowed' or 'Not Allowed'. If it is 'Not Allowed' and if IBAN is given in payment order or 'Mandatory' and IBAN not given, then error will be thrown.

Validation Rules: Optional field. Allowed or Mandatory for payment through beneficiary. If Country rules is present, then Allowed /Mandatory can be set only if allowed in country rules. If Country rules is not present, then all options are possible.
The field BENEFICIARY.IC in a PAYMENT.ORDER transaction done using pay through beneficairy option, can hold value based on configuration of this field.
Allowed options are either 'Mandatory', 'Allowed' or 'Not Allowed'. If it is 'Not Allowed' and if BIC is given in payment order or 'Mandatory' and BIC not given, then error will be thrown.
Validation Rules: Optional field. Allowed or Mandatory for payment through beneficiary. If Country rules is present, then Allowed /Mandatory can be set only if allowed in country rules.
The field BEN.BANK.CODE in a PAYMENT.ORDER transaction done using pay through beneficairy option, can hold value based on configuration of this field.

Allowed options are either 'Mandatory', 'Allowed' or 'Not Allowed'. If it is 'Not Allowed' and if bank code is given in payment order or 'Mandatory' and bank code not given, then error will be thrown.
Validation Rules: Optional field. Allowed or Mandatory for payment through beneficiary. If Country rules is present, then Allowed /Mandatory can be set only if allowed in country rules.
Multivalue field to hold the list of currencies for which the payment order will be accepted for the country, payment order with any currencies other than one defined will not be allowed.

Should be one of the currencies allowed in Payment Order Country Rules.If Country rules is not present, then all currencies are possible. When left undefined then payment order will be open for all currencies.
Validation Rules: Optinal field. A valid currency code from CURRENCY application.

Indicates the allowed clearing channel to be used for the country. Should be one of the clearing channel as per Payment Order Country rules. If Country rules is not present, then all channels are possible.
Validation Rules: Valid record from CLEARING.CHANNEL lookup table.

Indicates the format of the clearing code based on which the clearing code entered in payment order will be validated. If not defined for a clearing channel then, value will be defaulted from country rules clearing format.
Validation Rules: Alphanumeric. Associated with above country clearing channel field.
